pages.text: Falamma Jahhazahum Bijahazihim Ja`ala As-Siqayata Fi Rahli 'Akhihi Thumma 'Adhana Mu'uadhinun 'Ayyatuha Al-`Iru 'Innakum Lasariquna
Qalu Nafqidu Suwa`a Al-Maliki Wa Liman Ja'a Bihi Himlu Ba`irin Wa 'Ana Bihi Za`imun
Qalu Ta-Allahi Laqad `Alimtum Ma Ji'na Linufsida Fi Al-'ArÄ‘i Wa Ma Kunna Sariqina
Qalu Jaza'uuhu Man Wujida Fi Rahlihi Fahuwa Jaza'uuhu Kadhalika Najzi Az-Zalimina

Fabada'a Bi'aw`iyatihim Qabla Wi`a'i 'Akhihi Thumma Astakhrajaha Min Wi`a'i 'Akhihi Kadhalika Kidna Liyusufa Ma Kana Liya'khudha 'Akhahu Fi Dini Al-Maliki 'Illa 'An Yasha'a Allahu Narfa`u Darajatin Man Nasha'u Wa Fawqa Kulli Dhi `Ilmin `Alimun
Qalu 'In Yasriq Faqad Saraqa 'Akhun Lahu Min Qablu Fa'asarraha Yusufu Fi Nafsihi Wa Lam Yubdiha Lahum Qala 'Antum Sharrun Makanaan Wa Allahu 'A`lamu Bima Tasifuna
Qalu Ya 'Ayyuha Al-`Azizu 'Inna Lahu 'Abaan Shaykhaan Kabiraan Fakhudh 'Ahadana Makanahu 'Inna Naraka Mina Al-Muhsinina
